title: sneaky nerf to kayn?
body:
i dont know if this is a bug or not but kayns R doesnt dodge tower shoots now.
if this was inteded why wasnt it in the patch notes?
and if it isnt inteded plz fix

i think it happens when the tower shoot comes from behind u and when kayn is closer to the tower then the enemy champion.

so lets say ur ganking top lane. and then the enemy top laner is where the caster minions would be if the minion wave crashed to the tower.
and then gank from the tri brush and go thru the wall that is in between the tower and the tribrush. and that would put you behind the enemy laner and thne u atuo him once and take tower aggro then u press R while the tower shoot is mid air and am pretty sure tha the tower shoot would still hit

i dont really know what causes the bug but i know exactly when it happens and i can make it happen everytime now.
the tower shot goes if u press R right when the tower fires. so if u take agro then the tower shot fires at u and u take the hit then right when it fires th 2nd shot u press R u will still take dmg from the tower.
i would show a video of this but i dont know how to record lmao
